channel.title: Home on Homecat
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Homecat

item.title: Hugo Theme Walden
item.author: 13050082@qq.com (Homecat)
item.description: After reading Walden, a collection of essays by American writer Henry David Thoreau, I was deeply influenced by his love of nature and simple living. So, I wrote this concise and clear theme for my personal website and named it Walden.

item.title: 安娜普尔纳 ABC 九日
item.author: 13050082@qq.com (Homecat)
item.description: 安娜普尔纳（Annapurana）地区位于尼泊尔北部的喜马拉雅山中段，有两条成熟且知名的徒步线路：一条去往安娜普尔纳大本营ABC（Annapurna Base Camp），另一条围绕着安娜普尔纳群峰行进的环线ACT（Annapurna Circle Trail）。

item.title: Formats of Shortcodes
item.author: 13050082@qq.com (Homecat)
item.description: Shortcodes are simple snippets inside content files calling built-in or custom templates. This article shows the formats of shortcodes in hugo theme Walden.

item.title: Formats of Markdown Elements
item.author: 13050082@qq.com (Homecat)
item.description: Markdown is a lightweight markup language used to add formatting elements to plaintext text documents. This article shows the formats of markdown elements in hugo theme Walden.
